## StringHandlerParams.stringHandler() method

A function which transforms a string into a prosemirror node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringHandler?(params: FromStringParams): ProsemirrorNode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>FromStringParams</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ProsemirrorNode`

## Remarks

Can be used to transform markdown / html or any other string format into a prosemirror node.

See [fromHTML](./core-utils.fromhtml.md) for an example of how this could work.
